markdownRemark.excerpt: Newcomers Baboon Prophecy drop a wicked first release, available on 7" vinyl and Digital, featuring the great Alicante-based soul singer Sailor Smile and the mighty Taiwan MC ! Check out the video created by the super talented Gridboy: Buy the 7" or digital track on Bandcamp ...and follow Baboon Prophecy, Taiwan MC, and Sailor Smile for more vibes !
markdownRemark.html:
Newcomers Baboon Prophecy drop a wicked first release, available on 7" vinyl and Digital, featuring the great Alicante-based soul singer Sailor Smile and the mighty Taiwan MC !


Check out the video created by the super talented Gridboy:

Buy the 7" or digital track on Bandcamp

...and follow Baboon Prophecy, Taiwan MC, and Sailor Smile for more vibes !

frontmatter.author: Asymetrics
frontmatter.teaser: A scorching new tune & video straight outta Spain featuring champion MC Sticky Tai Tai - listen !
frontmatter.title: Baboon Prophecy ft Taiwan MC & Sailor Smile - Times so Hard
